original_title: Nick Lowe with Los Straitjackets: Live from First Avenue
overview: "Saint" Nick Lowe brought his Quality Rock and Roll Revue to First Avenue in Minneapolis on Friday, September 13, 2019. Backed by the mask-wearing surf rock band Los Straitjackets, Lowe delivered 90+ minutes of iconic classics from his catalog as a producer, solo artist and member of Rockpile.
title: Nick Lowe with Los Straitjackets: Live from First Avenue
